info.description: Super REST API Boilerplate with Go
info.title: API Boilerplate

put.description: Update the expiration date for a user's API key

delete.description: Remove the expiration date for a user's API key (never expires)

put.description: Update the rate limit for a user's API key (requests per minute)

get.description: Get audit logs with filtering and pagination

delete.description: Delete audit logs older than specified days

parameters.description: Delete logs older than this many days
parameters.name: days

get.description: Get detailed audit log by ID including request/response body

post.description: Create a new configuration with name and description

get.description: Get list of all soft deleted configurations
Get a specific configuration by its key
Get a specific configuration by its ID

delete.description: Soft delete a configuration (set status_id to 0)

post.description: Restore a soft deleted configuration (set status_id to 1)
Create a new example with name and description
Create a chat completion using AI (OpenAI compatible API)
Create a streaming chat completion using AI (OpenAI compatible API)

get.description: Get list of all soft deleted examples
Get a specific example by its ID

delete.description: Soft delete an example (set status_id to 0)

post.description: Restore a soft deleted example (set status_id to 1)

get.description: Get list of all groups with their permissions

post.description: Create a new group with permissions

get.description: Get a specific group by its ID with permissions

put.description: Update permissions assigned to a group

post.description: Create a new permission with resource and action

get.description: Get a specific permission by its ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and your API token
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
